title: My account got hacked
body: My account got hacked and I don't play the game. I've createds an account 2 years ago, played a bit and then I left the game. Today I got an email from riot that says that I am banned from the game until 2044!!!!

replies.body: It doesn't look like this account is banned at this moment, but if you're still having problems getting logged in you'll need to refer to your ticket with those EU agents. They'll be able to explain everything that was going on, why the ban was placed, and hopefully get you back in the game if you'd like!
